reviewText: I enjoyed his series as a period soap covering WWI in England....very English.
this was so fun to watch these videos again but without interruption. would love to pass this onto others interested but can't seem to find a lot of fans. their loss.

First of all this British Movie has close caption. My wife has a hearing problem & has difficulty understanding British Movies because of the accents of the player's words. We own both of the 2 series of Dutchess of Duke Street.
This series follows  a young maid who wants to be a cook. It follows her life from a cook, mistress to the Duke Of Wales to owner of a hotel catering to the elite of British Society. The cast of characters are excellent ranging from Dukes to maids. Each segment tells a story that draws the series together for an excellent tale of British life in the early 1900's
